description:
In this Course we will be looking at Bernina Software 7 and as part of the Bernina Software 7 Fundamentals we will cover the Design Sizing and Design Scaling .

In this course we will only work with Video and will add some .jpg designs in the resources section.

That is what is so great! What words cannot say, the screen can show.

- I tell you,

- I show you,

- I explain why,

- and I have recorded it.

- You do not see my face,

- and I do not see yours.

It is the Bernina Embroidery Software 7 program we are interested in, and I love students to be interactive by adding comments to the discussion section

You can ask your questions about Bernina Embroidery Software 7 courses or any other even if I show you a step, and you want to do it in another way you are allowed to discuss this.

  • you download your videos or watch them online,
  • and replay as many times you like
  • These embroidery software classes are run by YOU. You decide on the direction of the classes.
  • Amazing but true!

It is all about learning from one another.

As a student of the Bernina Embroidery Software 7 on Udemy, you can purchase prior classes at $3 to what non members pay for it if you want it.
title: #02:  Bernina Software 7: How to do Sizing and Scaling
